description: Probus Rome is the best app to quickly find your way around Rome by bus. You are in Rome and you need to know when the next bus is coming ? or find the nearest bus stop ? or what is the bus route of a line ? Probus Rome is the leading Android application that answers to these questions. With more than 240.000 users Probus Rome allows you to: • easily have realtime waiting times at your finger tips • manage your favourite geolocalized bus stop list • plan your journey with the public transport (bus, underground, train) • show bus route maps and connections • search for nearby Atac bus stops • show departure timetables • search for nearby ticket offices • see live travel news • see realtime tweets from RomaMobilità and InfoAtac Features: • easy and simple user interface • favourite stops list at your finger tips • over 8600 searchable Atac stops in Rome • GPS for a better data accuracy • essential day-to-day application for locals,students,tourists for the public local transportation use. • constantly updated,developed and improved • attention and care to user requests WARNING: Probus Rome requires an Internet connection to retrieve the realtime bus waiting times and journey planner. Probus Rome is an unofficial application and uses datas provided by muoversiaroma.it (Roma Servizi per la Mobilità) and is not responsible at all of the accuracy of waiting times and journey planner results. Data source: ATAC, Roma Mobilità ( ATAC Autobus, Bus Roma, ATAC Metropolitana, Metro Roma) For bug or suggestions do not hesitate to email to probus.rm@gmail.com . Each report will be carefully considered to improve Probus Rome in every aspects.

description: Card Game Raspisnoy Poker ("Up & Down", Georgian Poker). This is not like classic poker, this is trick-taking game like "Preference" and "1000". Despite the fact that "Raspisnoy poker" is simpler than Preference, the game is highly gambling and exciting. Hopefully after competition with AI you will gather your friends together and spend a lot of wonderful nights playing "Raspisnoy poker" with glass of your favorite drink. Features: - game is designed in Soviet style; - worthy and quick-thinking AI; - high definition graphics; - autosaving every turn; - online table of top players. You can find more details about game rules and features in the "Game rules" menu. *** ATTENTION! Game is designed for devices with at least 480x320 screen resolution *** *** The game is optimized for a screen resolution of 800 x 480 up to 1920x1080 ***

Primarily for converting between number bases, but also with simple calculator functions and the advantage of showing simultaneously the same number in Decimal, Octal, Hex, Binary and ASCII. Optional base 3-9 capability (replaces octal). Most calculators display only a single row of digits - this one displays five lines at once. 63-bit capability. Calculator functions AND, OR, XOR, NOT and Shift included. Copy and paste to clipboard. It is designed for the buttons to be pressed on the screen - you can't use a hardware keyboard. Android 4.03+. ADW Launcher Theme Pink Heart Black Crown It is an ADW-THEME which requires the latest ADW-LAUNCHER application be installed. The ADW-theme includes six wallpapers, alarm clock and icon package. After installation of the Theme please press button "Open". It will forward you to the Market to download and install free version of the ADW launcher provided it is not already installed. To Use the Theme: Start ADW-launcher. Press Menu, choose ADW Settings and then Themes Preferences. Choose the Theme and apply it. Long press on any application icon on your desktop. "Custom shortcut" menu will popup. Press on the icon picture once more, then select ADWTheme icon pack, and choose any icon you like for your application. To Change the Wallpaper: Long press on the desktop, choose "Wallpapers" and then the Themes wallpaper. Scroll among three wallpapers, select and press "Set wallpaper". If after the theme installation wallpaper looks slightly blurred please choose wallpaper chooser to reset it. To Open the Alarm Clock: Long press the desktop, choose "Widgets" and then the Themes alarm clock It is very useful to watch youtube video about the Theme.

description: Maybe the most feature-rich and challenging implementation of the classic Dots and Boxes game on Google Play. This application offers very challenging Artificial Intelligence as well as many other features. The AI in the advanced difficulty levels is able to predict and anticipate the next moves. Also the application is very lightweight with the apk size not exceeding the 1.5MB. Features: 1) Play against friends or against computer. 2) Clever Artificial Intelligence which anticipates future moves. 3) Four AI difficulty levels: very-easy,easy, medium, hard. The AI is well designed with each next level being a bit harder than the previous level. 4) Multiple board sizes (from 3x3 dots to 12x12) 5) Ability to choose player name and your favourite colour 6) Quick match. No irritating menus just hit the launch icon and you are inside the action. ( Of course after entering the application you have the ability to select your favourite settings by hitting the MENU button. Your preferences will be saved so you won't have to change them each time you open the application. ) 7) Ability to set the game speed. 3 game speed level : slow, normal, fast. Fast level is appropriate for experienced player, slow is more appropriate for people who just started playing dots and boxes. 8) Statistics section for viewing your results against the computer 9) Ability to share your statistics and end-game screenshots with friends 10) Undo button For those who don't know the game To be good in the game you must have good observation skills and be able to predict the opponent's moves. So are you ready to take the challenge?? The rules are 1) Touch in between two dots to mark a line (vertical or horizontal). Your goal is to complete a four side box. 2) The player that completes a four side box has the oportunity to play one more time. 3) The player that will complete the most boxes wins the game. Enjoy!

Reduced application size by 50% Version 2.0 Added undo button

description: Dear Almosaly users, happy new Ramadan Initiation with breezes holy month of Ramadan We are pleased to offer you an important update for your preferred app to be of help to you and those you love, for have better worship and has many new features. • Complete support for Turkish language. • Complete support for German language (Android version only) • Turkish translation for morning , evening and prayer Azkar • German translation for morning , evening and prayer Azkar • Vocal translation for Azkar in English, Turkish and German letters. • Introducing Visual Qibla where you will be able to see Qibla direction to Haram directly on map with your distance to haram and tools for accurate horizontal alignment and magnetic field detection to avoid compass errors • Automatic location detection using GPS, now Almosaly can automatically detect your location and adjust the Prayer Times according to it. • Adjust Prayer Times for many countries like Kuwait, Qatar, Turkey, France, USA, Sweden and many more…, for accurate time. • Add many method of prayer time's calculation to better serve you needs. • Add new Azan sounds with beautiful voices. • Added "A Salat Khayton Men Al Nawm" alert before Fajr. • You can now add/select new Azan voices from iTunes library • Updated Social share plugins AlMosaly is an Islamic prayer reminder app; it's the most important Islamic app for all Muslims all around the world. As it has a very accurate prayer times, Qibla, Fasting, Day – night & prayer' Azkar, Ramadan Emsakia, Calendar and Quran. AlMosaly has two unique features which called "Silent mode during prayer" and" Mosques "which is showing the nearest mosques to your location with a very accurate GBS. Features: 1- Shows prayer times daily or for a whole week with any date you specify. 2- Shows Qibla direction with respect to: North, Sun and Moon direction. 3- GPS is supported to get prayer times or Qibla direction wherever you are. 4- Hijri (Arabic) Calendar and its corresponding Gregorian calendar 5- Ramadan Emsakeya(fajr and sunset) times 6- Quran share alerts, and saving your last read position. 7- Each prayer has its own alerts that you can adjust as you like: Alert for Azan time, before prayer times,and for iqama time . 8- AlMosaly also alerts you for other islamic activities like: evening prayers (qiyam), Duha prayer, Azkar, fasting, Friday alerts, and more activates which important to Islam. 9- You can select your location among thousands of cities all over the world, or you can add your custom location using GPS. 10- We offer "Mosques" screen where you find near mosques to you location on the map with routes to them. 11- On the application main screen we show selected videos for Mecca, Kaaba and Madina views. Keywords: Adhan, Allah, Compass, Mosque, Muslim, athan, hadith, tasbih, alarm, fajr, sahoor, full, book; search, year, dawn, round, calculator, translation, clock, season.
release_text: We are pleased to offer you an important update for your preferred app to be of help to you and those you love, for have better worship and has many new features. • Vocal translation for Azkar in English, Turkish and German letters. • Introducing Visual Qibla where you will be able to see Qibla direction to Haram directly on map with your distance to haram and tools for accurate horizontal alignment and magnetic field detection to avoid compass errors for full list visit almosaly facebook

description: M+ Messenger是一款提供跨平台整合通訊、商務協同合作、社群串連及與好友溝通的通訊軟體。 透過WiFi / 3G就可體驗，特色功能如下： 》各種免費溝通工具，「免費語音通話功能」、「語音訊息」、超多免費的圖貼小舖「酷圖+」、「預約訊息」，只要與朋友雙方都安裝M+，即可隨時隨地享受免費溝通的樂趣。 》「電話聯絡簿-網內網外標記」：透過電話簿標示您電話簿聯絡人目前是網內或網外，網內熱線不再煩惱，輕鬆控制費用不破表。 》不只可在手機上使用，個人電腦、平板電腦上都能使用「M+網頁版」。 》輕鬆成立社團群組，結合社群應用，將人、內容、商務資料與群組連結起來，讓社團、企業分享更有效率。 》重要公告訊息放上群組佈告欄，方便群組成員查找，新進成員也看得到。 》建構在企業等級的溝通平台，提供您在企業上資訊傳遞與溝通最安全的管道。 》還有各種即時新聞、運勢專家、達人等精闢解析或動態的「聚樂+」和請朋友喝咖啡、吃蛋糕，還能送提神飲料幫他打打氣的「好禮+」。 現在就下載一起來享受M+ Messenger提供不間斷的使用經驗。 M+貼心提醒：使用本軟體的上述功能會產生網路資料傳輸費，傳輸費用依據您的行動上網費率方案計價。

USEFUL HOTEL INFORMATION: See hotels plotted on a map, swipe through photo galleries, and read comprehensive reviews from travelers. CONVENIENT TRAVEL TOOLS: View your itineraries 24x7 – even offline. Get info on flight delays and gate changes, plus directions to your hotel. And when you book with a Gmail address, you'll get flight status, hotel check-in, and rental car pick-up reminders on day of travel if you use Google Now (Android v4.1+ Jellybean users). TRUSTED NAME: Enjoy a secure booking process, 24x7 customer service, no Orbitz fees on hotel cancellations or changes, plus our Best Price Guarantee: Orbitz customers who find their same prepaid hotel room, flight, or car for a lower price online may receive rewards equal to price difference + bonus of up to $200 to be used on a future hotel booking. * Save $775 when booking flight+hotel together: Savings based on Flight + Hotel vacation package bookings of 5 or more nights with individual calculable components on www.orbitz.com from October 1, 2014 through March 31, 2015, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates, and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages. APP PERMISSIONS ---------------------- • Device & app history: The app uses this to manage its own tasks and offer an improved experience when you switch between different sections of the app. • Identity: The app uses this so that Google+ users can sign in to their account on the app. • Location: The app uses this to allow you to search for hotels, airports, and other places near your current location. • Photos/Media/Files: The app uses this to display Google Maps. For example, you can toggle to a map-based view of hotel search results within the app.
release_text: Now you can book up to 4 hotel rooms at once on the app, plus mix-and-match room types. Need a standard room + suite instead of just 2 standard rooms? No problem! And, as always, we've also made a number of improvements so you can enjoy an even smoother app experience.

description: Welcome to the Overstock Shopping App. Find brand-name products at up to 70% off when you use the Overstock shopping app on your Android device to browse, search, and purchase all of the great products on the Overstock.com website. • Shop sales, daily deals, and weekly promotions wherever you are in the U.S. • Receive notifications for exclusive coupons and daily deals • Find the biggest discounts on brand-names at up to 70% off MSRP • Check out with Google Wallet • Easily contact our award winning Customer Care representatives with shopping or order questions * Free standard shipping on orders $45 and up (applies to U.S. orders only. For expedited shipping, additional charges will apply. Offer applies to the lower 48 states. Offer excludes Alaska, Hawaii, APO/FPO and international orders. Sales tax and charitable donations are excluded from subtotal for purposes of this offer). Although the app does require certain permissions, we will NOT have access to your personal information and we do NOT track or collect any information from other apps. Supports Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and higher.

Use this App, and have everyone gawking at your creative talent! Doesn’t matter whether they be pictures or photographs, this App helps you create identical images. Draw identical copies of the images that appear on the Live View Screen – it will be as if you’re drawing with tracing paper(Tracing Phone)! Show off drawings created by yours truly! ★ Keep your smart phone steady with objects you find around the house, such as a thick dictionary, a book, or even a cup, in order to create better results. Using a smart phone holder is also another option. ★ In order to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, make sure that the background of the photograph is bright, as brighter the background, the better chances of being able to trace more precisely. This App allows you to become an illustrator, an artist. Want to be able to draw your versions of pretty, adorable comic characters? Want to draw a picture of our favorite celebrity? What to draw a beautiful picture of your family and loved ones? Want to draw a picture of your dream car? You don’t need to resister at an art school to learn to draw awesome pictures. Show off, or even offer these self-drawn pictures as presents to those around you. You can draw anything – from a photograph you have just taken to your favorite celebrity, a cool car, or even another drawing you have always liked. You can take a picture of your family then use it as a drawing tool, or even draw a picture of your loved one’s face on to a letter and have it sent. You can also select the type of picture you want to draw, you even trace a photograph in your photo gallery. To take advantage of this application, you can finish with oilpaper(transparent paper) or tracing reap the benefits of using a light box. It can also be utilized for children’s art education purposes. *Due to specific patents on this App, creating similar Apps may raise copyright issues. How to use: 1.Either choose a picture of your choice or even take an instant photograph. Fix your phone steady, choose to ‘draw’, then prepare to start your drawing. 2.When the tracing paper appears on screen, trace the image carefully by looking at the smart phone’s live view screen. Remember to switch on and off the options that make both the tracing paper, as well as the focus indicator, appear and disappear. 3.Once you are done tracing out a basic sketch of the image, adjust the transparency of the smart phone to control color, shading, and even texture, in order to express yourself. 4.If the focus of the Live View seems unsteady, switch on the automatic focus finder button to adjust the focus of the picture. Switch it off once you are ready once again. 5.Also, if you want to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, you need not do it on-site. Take it somewhere you are comfortable with, choose the “draw picture of image in photo gallery” option to view the photograph. You will be able to create a beautiful drawing of the image that had been saved on to your phone.

description: Christmas Logo Trivial Quiz: this is quiz game that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of logos from different companies. Within days we will launch a new version with more logos, more levels and more! In brands with an ampersand in the name this can be replaced by 'and'. In brands with a dash in the name this can be left out. In brands with an apostrophe in the name this can be left out. Example: m&m's = mms There are 18 levels, with logos that you have to guess. When you're successful few will unlock the next level ...And the fun continues! More than 850 logos! These are many logos, but we are always looking for more logos to add to the game. But, How Many of Them Can You Recognize? Please note: All logos shown or represented in this game are protected by copyright and/or are trademarks of their respective corporations. This app, not anyone associated with it, claims any ownership (copyright or otherwise) of any logos used in this app. The logos are protected by copyright and/or trademark. The use of low res logo images in this app for use of identification qualifies as "Fair Use" under US copyright law. Twitterのフォロー/フォロワーを管理するためのツールです。 新規フォロワー、リムーブの検知や履歴保存、フォロー返し等がツール上で行えます。 また毎日定期的にバックグラウンド実行することが可能のため、アプリを起動しなくても1日間隔での新規フォロー、フォロー解除の履歴を更新していく事が可能です。 ■機能 下記の機能を備えております。 ・複数ユーザログイン(OAuth) ・相互フォローユーザ表示 ・フォローしているユーザ表示 ・フォローされているユーザ表示 ・新規フォローユーザ表示 ・新規フォロー解除ユーザ表示 ・ユーザ表示からTwitterへアクセス ・ユーザ表示からユーザWebページへアクセス ・ユーザー表示からfavstarへアクセス ・ユーザ表示からフォロー ・ユーザ表示からフォロー解除 ・ユーザ表示からのブロック ・新規フォロー、フォロー解除の履歴保存 ・データのHTMLでのエクスポート ・データのSDへのバックアップ及び復元 ・時刻を指定しての自動更新 ・取得済みの任意のユーザのフォロー、フォロワー状況表示 ・取得済みの任意のユーザ同士の共通フォロー、共通フォロワー抽出表示 It is a tool for managing the Twitter of follow / followers. New followers, remove the detection and history storage, follow-back, etc. can be done on the tool. In addition it is possible to continue to update because of the possibility to be regularly background execution every day, a new follow-up in the 1-day interval without having to launch the app, the history of the follow-up release. ■ Function It is equipped with the following functions. • Multiple user login (OAuth) And mutual follow user display And follow-up to that user display And follow-up that have been user display And new follow-up user display And new follow-up release user display Access from the user display to Twitter Access from the user display to the user Web page Access from the user display to favstar And follow-up from the user display Follow released from the user display Blocks from the user display And new follow-up, save history of the follow-up release Exporting in the data HTML Of data backup and restore to SD Automatic updating of and time specified by - Acquired any user of the follow, followers status display - Acquired any common follow-up between users of, common followers extraction display
release_text: Ver 1.82 ・バックグラウンド更新が失敗する不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.81 ・フォロー、アンフォロー、ブロックでの通信エラーを修正しました。 Ver 1.80 ・作成時期が新しいユーザーで通信エラーが発生する不具合を修正しました。 ・解像度の高い端末で画像が小さく表示される現象を修正しました。 Ver 1.72 ・Twitter API仕様変更により通信エラーが発生したいた問題に対応しました。 Ver 1.71 ・連続してブロック、アンフォローできない不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.70 ・ブロックしているユーザ一覧の表示に対応しました。 Ver 1.65 ・アンフォロー、ブロック時に確認ダイアログを表示するようにしました。 Ver 1.64 ・Twitter API 1.0の廃止によりTwitter API 1.1へ移行しました。これに伴い取得できるユーザー数が最大約35000人(1時間毎に回復)から最大約18000人(15分毎に回復)に減少しております。 ・通信エラーが発生する場合はログイン画面より再度「新規ユーザ登録」を行ってください。

description: Shows the currently playing track and artist in Floatifications (Floating Notifications) along with buttons to control your music (play/pause/next/previous). Tapping on the next in the notification will launch the player of your choice (you must select the player to launch in the preferences). Pro features: -Show album art instead of default icon -Automatic downloading of album art -Customize what info is displayed and how it is formatted The album art feature works with many players but some players that use their own database might not work, so be sure to use the album art test before purchasing. Translations: http://www.getlocalization.com/FNMusicExtension/ Works with most music players. If your player does not work, try the suggestions below. If it still doesnt work then your player is not compatible because it does not broadcast out what its playing. Android 4.4+: Enable the Notification Listener setting to support any player that also supports the android lockscreen music controls. Android 4.3 and earlier: If your player has last.fm scrobbling support, enable that. If not, look for a setting to broadcast metadata and enable that. FN Music Extension requires Floatifications (Floating Notifications) by Rob J: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=robj.floating.notifications Email any suggestions/issues to gonemadsoftware@gmail.com or visit the forums: http://gonemadmusicplayer.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=fnfeedback PERMISSIONS: -com.android.vending.BILLING: Used for in app purchase of a pro version of this extension -android.permission.INTERNET: Used to download album art -android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used to download album art -android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to save album art to storage

description: It should be fun to practice an instrument, and we think this metronome app can help with that. The virtual drum machine lets you play all the built in grooves, in any time signature and tempo you dial in. With all the functionality you can expect from an advanced metronome, this android app also gives you fine control over the swing level. The grooves are programmed to fit your music whether you play jazz, blues, pop, rock, bossa, samba, salsa, waltz or reggae etc. It does not matter if you play guitar, bass, piano, drums, percussion or any other instrument. Whether you are a professional musician or an enthusiast there are ways to make this metronome work for you. Improvise to any built in rhythm or practice to improve your timing. Learn to keep a steady pulse or find new beats. While the metronome is playing you can still modify parameters like tempo, time signature, shuffle and freely customize the swing level. You can set the swing on either eighths or sixteenths. From the settings menu you can activate the vibration feature, change the sound of the metronome or even set the color theme. These features helps when you are live on stage and need a discrete tempo indication. Use earphones, or plug into your amplifier or PA-system during band rehearsal to get the best experience. Practice becomes fun with a metronome that knows how to groove!
release_text: * Improved sound quality and dynamics * Added percussion on latin grooves * Added three new styles: Reggae, Double kick, "Rosanna" * A lot of styles has been reworked * Now supports Android 5 The reason for new permissions is that we now uses a system for automatic crash reports

Use your Microsoft Windows PC as remote dialer for managing incoming and outgoing calls and for writing and receiving SMS messages. Look for missed incoming calls in your call log, read your SMS and use your phone contacts for dialing and creating SMS messages. All from your Windows desktop via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.... Ideal in conjunction with a Bluetooth headset. You can leave your phone in the docking station while managing your calls. The additional Microsoft Office integration allows simple dialing and SMS creation direct from Outlook, Word and Excel. Also look for the 15 day trial version "Remote Phone Call Trial". Simply the remote control for your mobile phone! CallCenter features (app running on your PC): - Shows phone contacts - Shows call log - Allows dialing contacts, call log entries and entered numbers - Writing and reading SMS messages - Contact search - Answer incoming calls - Popup for incoming calls and SMS messages - Manage audio settings - Hotkey for dialing numbers from the clipboard - Hotkey for accepting incoming calls - Handle "tel" and "callto" ULRs - Auto start at windows login CallCenter Microsoft Office integration: - Allows dialing selected numbers using the context menu of the text editor (Outlook, Excel and Word) - Allows calling email sender and recipients with help of contact information (Outlook) RemotePhone features (app running on your phone): - Auto start with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth - Acoustic signal on connect - Show connection status - Send or download client installation package to your Microsoft Windows PC System requirements: - Android 2.0 or higher - a Microsoft Windows PC (XP or newer) - a Wi-Fi (WLAN) environment or a Bluetooth* enabled PC - optional: Microsoft Office 2007 or newer *Supported Bluetooth stacks: default Microsoft stack, WIDCOMM stack The PC application CallCenter offers a programming interface (API), which allows developers the use of the remote control features within arbitrary own applications. The SDK together with a sample can be found in the subdirectory "SDK" within the installation directory on your PC. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@justremotephone.com ! We cannot respond to comments left on Google Play.
release_text: - new: Extended features for rooted phones (see www.justremotephone.com) - new: WiFi network filter for autostart feature - fixed: Answering calls not possible on Android 5.0 - fixed: Some special characters like # cannot be dialed - fixed: Client setup sometimes fails with DLL not found

description: With this app you have clear weather all weather conditions and in different colors and tiles View. You can store and display up to 7 cities. Features: - 7 cities save and show - GPS support - Complete, accurate weather data - Ice warning (for example for your car) - Barometer Trend - Sunrise / sunset, day length - Moonrise / moonset, moon phase - Landscape Weather data: - Weather situation as text - Temperature - Chill Temperature - Humidity in% - Max / Min temperature of the day - Air pressure - Wind speed and direction - Dew point with ice warning - Visibility in km or miles * - 4 days preview, picture, Min, Max, rain probability, weather situation - Sun: Sunrise, Sunset, Day length *, time - Moon: rise, fall, phase as text and image * - Precipitation Radar (Germany), animated - Map (if outside Germany) - Current Zodiac - Settings * If available for the city Settings: - Temperature in ° C or ° F - Wind speed in km / h, mph, knots, m / s, Beaufort - Air pressure in mb, hPa, Torr, psi, inchHG - 7 cities with test function and GPS or select from map

▣ 자전거 등록/조회 서비스 – 바이크서치 ▣ 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 끝! 스마트한 자전거 등록/조회 서비스! 바이크서치(BikeSearch)는 자전거를 등록하고, 조회하고, 도난/분실 신고하는 서비스입니다. (★ 2013 LBS 활용 앱&웹 공모전 방송통신위원회위원장상 수상) [자전거 등록 서비스] - 구입과 함께 찾아오는 자전거 도난/분실의 공포 - 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 내 자전거 등록 끝! - 없어진 내 자전거, 불법 유통되는 건 용납 못 해! - 중고 자전거 팔 때도, 안전하게 등록된 자전거니까 OK [자전거 조회 서비스] - 중고 자전거 사고 팔 때, 묻지마 거래는 이제 그만! - 차대번호만 입력하면 자전거 정보와 소유자 정보가 한 번에! - 사고 싶은데, 도난 자전거면 어쩌지? 조회 한 번이면, 걱정 끝! [도난/분실 신고 서비스] - 자전거가 없어진 현장에서 바로, 실시간 도난/분실 신고! - 도난/분실 위치 찍고 시간 입력하면, 바로 도난 자전거 지도에 업데이트! - 현상금 추가 기능으로 내 자전거 빠르게 찾기 시도 - 댓글 제보로 하나되는 우리 동네 자전거 지킴이 서비스 [NFC 태그 서비스] - 특수 제작된 바이크서치 NFC 태그를 자전거에 부착 - 등록된 내 자전거 정보를 바이크서치 NFC 태그에 저장 - 스마트폰만 접촉(NFC 기능 ON)하면 손쉽게 등록 정보 조회 - 중고 자전거 거래 시, 도난/분실 의심 자전거 발견 시 접촉만 하면 뙇! (등록방법 보기) http://youtu.be/fcUAat8QSHc (조회방법 보기) http://youtu.be/OOaWj20nm9o ※ 응? 차대번호가 뭔가요? - 차대번호는 자전거 프레임에 새겨진 고유의 번호로 영어와 숫자 조합으로 이루어져 있습니다. By 9LAB [바이크서치 웹사이트] www.bikesearch.co.kr [바이크서치 페이스북] https://www.facebook.com/bikesearch 추천 TAG ] ------------------------- 바이크서치, bikesearch, 자전거, 자전거등록제, 자전거조회, 차대번호, 도난, 신고, NFC, 태그, 바이크, bike, bicycle, 4대강, 노원구자전거, Tranggle, 트랭글, 에코마일리지, GPS, 속도계, 행복나눔, 두바퀴, mtb, 국토종주, 삼천리, 바이크앤 ---- 개발자 연락처 : info@9lab.kr

This is open source project. You can find sources here - https://github.com/Nikolay-Kha/TabletClock Do you have old tablet? Or do you want to make your lovely device to show time and weather forecast when it on charging? This application for you! Nowadays wall clock are quite stupid, but price for them is a little bit less that price for tablet PC. And weather station is expensive. So, why do you need to buy stupid clock or expensive weather station when you can take this application and the cheapest table pc or old useless one and get smart clock: - they wouldn't lost time during blackouts. And it even doesn't require batteries for that, because device already has rechargeable battery - screen brightness is auto adjustable. Even if your device has not light sensor - application use camera as light sensor (disabled in settings by default) - you can choose one of 16 million color for displaying - alarm clock from Android OS - displaying current date, sunset and sunrise - weather now, forecast for one day each 6 hour and forecast on next week: temperature, wind speed and direction, pressure, clouds, precipitation and if sky is clear - moon phase, Units for temperature, speed and pressure are adjustable. - automatic start and close application on plugged/unplugged charger ( disabled in settings by default ) - and even do not have to set up time on this clock, because Android OS could take time from network and you will have exact time! You can use this application for your lovely device like screen saver while charging. Especially for devices with dock stations. Just turn on autorun and autoclose feature in settings and clock will appear while device is docking. Tips: On first launch choose your city for weather forecast. If your device have navigation bar, it will be hidden on application start. Any touch return navigation bar to screen, is not affecting on application. Touch the alarm clock icon to show system alarm clock. Touch the time to show application menu (the same as menu button, in case if your device does not have menu button). Touch the weather to switch two types of forecast - dayly and weekly. If your device does not has a light sensor, but it has camera, better front, turn on brightness adjusting using camera in settings - it will measure light every 30 seconds. But if you run this on unplugged device it will decrease on-battery time. Time and date format are taken from system. If you need brightness lower that your device allows, change in settings -> text color value R, G, B to lower ones. For example: if you change green (#00FF00) to 80 instead of FF, brightness will twice lower. You can choose screen rotation in settings. Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap - http://openweathermap.org All weather data are provided under the CC-BY-SA 2.0 license - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0
release_text: v1.3 api key added v1.2 weather forecast now keeps in device memory, so app could show forecast even without internet screen rotation, portrait mode navigation bar remover improved date text over-filling fixed minor bugs+cosmetic fixes v1.1 android 4.4 KitKat support 2560x1600 devices support improved auto brightness adjustment using camera icons brightness now is depend on text brightness minor bugs fixes

description: This application is a useful tool to help you improve your English. We hope this application will prove to be a useful tool to help improve your English reading and listening skills. It is a collection of free English text and audio files we have gathered from the internet. We have put them together in one convenient place for easy access. The application connects you directly to our private server and allows you to download the files straight to your phone. The files are saved in the folder /sdcard/ListenEnglish. The first time you run the program you will see a message saying, “The English texts and audio files don’t exist on your phone. Would you like to download?” Choose ‘Accept’ to confirm. You will then be able to choose which files you would like to download. If you find that you cannot access the files after downloading them, simply navigate to the folder, delete the files, and re-download them. The more you download the more storage space it will occupy on your phone or sd card. Data charges may occur according to your data plan. The more data is used the more you may be charged. Wi-fi connections normally do not use the 3G network, so data rates do not apply. We will be updating our server from time to time adding more English text and audio files for you to enjoy. Updated lists will be automatically applied and available for viewing. *keyword Audio Book/English Listening/Study English/LC/Free Listening/Read Book/Read English/English Book/
release_text: v1.2 # The first run-time error correction. v1.1 # download problem fixed.

description: Sudoku - Puzzle, develop your memory and thinking. If you've been in a book store in the last six months - or an airport, waiting room or college lecture class - you've probably seen someone staring at a sudoku. Given its popularity, one might think it's some new type of porn. But no, it's just a puzzle. It's a widespread, logic-based fad of a puzzle that is simple enough to suck you in and difficult enough to keep you hooked. In this article, we'll find out what a sudoku puzzle entails, how to go about solving one and where the concept originated (hint: It's not Japan. Let's get started. Sudoku is a game of numbers - specifically, the numbers 1 through 9 - but it really isn't about math. It's about logic. Instead of 1 through 9, you could use the first nine letters of the alphabet or a set of nine symbols, and it would be the same game. The basis of sudoku is a nine-by-nine grid. You've got three sections to think about: rows, columns and boxes. The goal of sudoku is to fill each nine-square row, each nine-square column and each nine-square box with the numbers 1 through 9, with each number used once and only once in each section. It's the interaction between the rows, columns and boxes that tells you where the numbers need to go. So if you were to start with a blank grid and fill in the numbers for row 1, column 2 and box 4 according to the sudoku rules. Of course, starting with a blank grid wouldn't make it much of a challenge. A sudoku puzzle already has some of the numbers filled in, and it's your job to figure out where the rest of the numbers go. Differences from the free version: - More games. - No advertising. Options: - 3 seasons with 150 games. 5 levels of difficulty. - Very comfortable dynamic keyboard to quickly select the correct number. - Rating game users with display of the country. - Displays the number of entering and remaining digits. - Painting numbers on the keypad at its full entry into the game (9 digits). - Add notes and more.
release_text: - New season games (150 games). - Fixed some bugs.

description: Find pairs and collect magical gems through multiple levels of raising difficulty in this unique game inspired by mahjong solitaire. Features: * Multiple levels, * Minigames (Memory and Rivers), * Hand drawn fantasy graphics, * Lives, * Zoom in and out, * Gems, * Dynamic fantasy music, * Challenging game play - beat the time bar! Turn off shadows on slower phones.
release_text: 1.50 15 new levels No need to unlock levels anymore Bug fixes

description: The most popular solitaire in the world - Klondike Solitaire also known as Patience - with clear graphics perfect for phones and tablets of every screen size. Rules - move cards from A to K to foundations, - build piles down by altering colors (8 diamond on 9 cross), - in hard difficulety you can pass the deck only three time, Tips how to win - try not to move cards from top deck (waste) to your piles unless you really need them, - move cards to foundations (A to K on the top right) quickly, - use undo to solve harder cases. Features - autosave, you don't need to worry when a phone calls interupting your game, - three difficulty levels: draw 1 Klondike Solitaire (easy), draw 3 Klondike Solitaire (medium and hard) - score, - undo, - easy moving of cards (you can move whole pile even if you need to only move one card!), - smooth animations, - double click to move cards to foundation, - high resolution for ICS tablets and phones, - zoom In this release some things are not yet ready - but expect them soon: - music, - image backgrounds (right now you can only change colour), - additional card deck (like in Spider Solitaire HD). From the makers of Spider Solitaire HD.

Engaging puzzle platformer with adventure and arcade elements. Lead a wizardess, a troll and a knight on a journey home by jumping, collecting coins, solving puzzles, fighting monsters and interacting with funny creatures. Excellent 2D side-scroller for both casual and avid players in love with retro games with head-scratching puzzles and humorous dialogues voiced in a fun bable-talk. New levels coming soon. This is initial version, please report any problems.
release_text: 1.55 Fixes related to level 9 issues - thank for those who reported them! Polish translation 1.50 Blue episode with new levels

description: Dynamic game of matching pictures for kids, children and adults! Requires good reflexes. Children will love it! With multiplayer mode! Features: ★ physics engine, ★ 28 Water levels ★ 28 Ice levels ★ 28 Earth levels ★ 28 Christmas levels ★ local multiplayer ★ additional Classic levels ★ collect stars and try to beat your highscore, ★ three difficulty levels, ★ funny pictures and animated creatures that help or make matters worse, children will love it! ★ lives, ★ fun music, ★ multilayered levels, ★ fish and birds making things a little harder and a pigeon that saves drowning tiles for you, ★ dragon that eats the tile - you have to find the pair for it before the dragon spits it, ★ carnivorous plant that eats images ★ mole that throws tiles off the screen The game uses physics engine and adds multiple hurdles and aids to spice up the classical game of finding pairs of pictures. It's suitable for all ages. Find all pairs before they drown in the rising water or are pushed out of screen by fish. If you found a bug or it doesn't work on your device - please contact us, we'll fix it as fast as we can. If you comment about problems - please write what device do you use - so we can check and correct any bugs! The game uses libGDX and box2D libraries.

Russian Solitaire is less known but very involving solitaire similar to Yukon. When playing 2 or 4 suits use undo to win! Features: - high resolutions for tablets and larger phones, - clean cards, - undo, - saving state, - 1 suit (easy), 2 suit (hard, use undo!), 4 suit (very hard, a real challenge) Rules - You can move any group of not reversed cards, - You can drop cards when card below has the same suit and is one point higher than the starting card, - You can put only Kings on empty places Tips - Try to release reversed card ASAP, - Don't move cards to the foundation too soon, they may be needed later Check our other solitaires!
release_text: Initial card stack fix (thanks, Ty!) Stats&Hints

description: You don't need expensive, ineffective gadgets or complicated training routines in order to lose fat and improve fitness condition. A few but challenging minutes of our predefined body weight, high intensity interval workouts including cardio, plyometric, strength and balance exercises will quickly convince you that strong will and half an hour per day is more than enough for achieving your goals. If you are not familiar with any of the exercises from the included workouts, you can find short description for each one in section Workouts Library. The app also offers easy to use and configure timer that allows you define your own interval training. Set number of rounds, duration of working cycles and rest time and you can start! -------------- Overview on functionalities: - 3 predefined Tabata workouts (Tabata for beginners, Tabata for legs and Tabata for upper body) - Option to create your own tabata workout choosing from more than 40 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined Bodyweigth workouts (Cardio for beginners, Cardio for intermediate/advanced, Strength) - Option to create your own Bodyweight workout choosing from more than 40 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined 10-minute Challenges ( Plank Challenge, Burpee Challenge, Squat Challenge) - Configurable and easy to set up countdown timer - Alarm sound between work and rest periods. Alarm volume is controlled by the volume controls of your device - Warning ticks during the last three seconds of each interval - Workouts library with short description of each exercise, included in the predefined workouts -------------- Please feel free to write suggestions, comments, error reports or feedback to our e-mail as we cannot answer the comments - we will be more than happy to help and hear from our users!
release_text: Version 2.0: - You have asked for it and now it is finally online: Section "Create Workout" allows you now to choose from a list of all available exercises - New feature: If you want to bring your training sessions to the next level, now you can even decide how many times (Sets) you will repeat the exercises in each round of your workout. A combination of multiple sets and rounds is possible - Minor bug fixes

Quick Dice Roller is an app made for the tabletop RPG Geek. It allows to emulate almost all the complex dice rolls required by RPG and board games. The dice can be added at will and organized in dice bags. Each die is defined by a formula such as 2d6+5 as well as special functions like rak(1d6,4,3) that allow to emulates the most complex game systems. An handy formulas builder simplifies the process, and allow to access to an online help. Check the list of all supported functions here: http://goo.gl/mZkcQS Thanks to "named values", as well as keep track of games scores, you can define formulas using variable parameters. You can create, for example, the named value "Level" with label "lvl", then use the formula (lvl)d6 to determine the fireball damage. So when your mage level up you don't need to edit the formula: just change the "Level" value! What you can do with Quick Dice Roller: ★ Roll dice with a touch ★ Organize dice in dice bags ★ Use same formulas you're familiar to ( xdy+z ) ★ Keep track of scores and use them in formulas ★ Read or listen the roll result in a clear way ★ Check the goodness of the rolls made ★ Apply modifiers on the fly with a touch ★ Sum a roll to the previous automagically or on demand ★ Paste last roll result from the clipboard in another app ★ Keep track of last rolls made Other features of Quick Dice Roller ○ Simple and intuitive Formulas Builder ○ Many functions to emulate main systems ○ Online help ○ Read aloud the last result ○ Sound notifications ○ Highly customizable ○ Friendly and reliable developer :P ○ Persistence of data among various installations* ○ Import and export dice and dice bags definitions** Some of currently supported systems ☆ 13th Age ☆ Arcan Myth ☆ Aeon IV ☆ BASH! ☆ Burning Wheel ☆ Call of Cthulhu ☆ Deadlands ☆ Dungeon World ☆ Dungeons & Dragons (all editions) ☆ Dungeonslayers ☆ Dystopian Wars ☆ Exalted ☆ Feng Shui ☆ GURPS ☆ HERO System ☆ Legend of the five rings ☆ Lords of Knowledge ☆ MERP ☆ Numenera ☆ Pathfinder ☆ Rolemaster ☆ Savage Worlds ☆ Shadowrun ☆ Star Wars ☆ Traveller ☆ World of Darkness ...and many more! Quick Dice Roller is a free and open source application for Android. Everyone can (and is invited to) contribute to its development in one or more of the following ways: • Join the official community on Google+ → http://goo.gl/atlhS9 • Become a beta tester for trialling of new features → http://goo.gl/UuJBSO • Improve translations or add new ones → http://goo.gl/9ySLIO • Check the source code for bug hunting (or for fun) → http://goo.gl/06fEHI • Make your friends know about Quick Dice Roller *The availability of data and preferences backup depends on the device's manufacturer, and is only supported on Android 2.2 or later. **This feature requires reading and writing to external storage.
release_text: - New function "reroll" - Select dice bags to import - Import/Export from/to external app - Output "-0" if result is negative before truncation - Added 4dF to the default set - Create Dice Bags with just one dice - Fixed the FC on Named Value picker - Fixed the FC using decimal separator - Fixed ANR in dice editor - Minor fix and improvements

description: TABATA Timer is a Timer to operate for auxiliary contact interval training bearing the name of the scholar Tabata of Japan. After exercise eight sets of 20 seconds, basic set is 10 seconds break. You can exercise time and the number of sets, to set the break time according to the convenience of the user. By by repeating interval exercise, to perform high intensity exercise in a short time, You can get the motion effect of many little time. You can use the Settings button in the upper left, to adjust set, exercise, and rest. It is possible to use the reset button at the top right, make a fresh start from the beginning again. You can use the button below to perform a pause function and exercise start. I will let you know at the start of break and notification sounds movement start.

Some additional features are available as in-app purchases to support development. * Tasker/Locale plug-in * DashClock extension * TeslaUnread support If you would like to apply a previous donation towards an in-app purchase, please send your Google Play Store transaction ID to support@tasks.org . You can find your transaction ID in your order confirmation e-mail or by visiting wallet.google.com. Tasks is not affiliated with Yahoo or Todoroo. ---- * For more details about app permissions visit https://github.com/tasks/tasks/wiki/App-Permissions * To help translate the app visit https://github.com/tasks/tasks/wiki/Translations * To become a beta tester visit https://play.google.com/apps/testing/org.tasks * To report bugs or request features visit https://github.com/tasks/tasks/issues * For more information on migrating from Astrid visit https://github.com/tasks/tasks/wiki/Migrating-from-Astrid * Astrid third party apps need to make minor modifications to support Tasks.

description: Consulta los horarios de omnibus interdepartamentales en el Uruguay. No incluye los horarios de la terminal de Río Branco. No es obligatorio tener a Montevideo como origen o destino. Cuando no existe una linea directa es necesario que el usuario conozca el mapa político de Uruguay para encontrar una combinación que le sirva. A modo de ejemplo, para ir desde Melo a Salto que no hay linea directa, una opción es buscar desde Melo a Tacuarembó, y después de Tacuarembó a Salto. La aplicación brinda los resultado según los datos publicados en: https://catalogodatos.gub.uy/dataset/horarios-interdepartamentales-omnibus . Los horarios son de cobertura temporal desde el 01/03/2015 al 18/12/2015. Fecha última de actualización de datos: 25 de Marzo de 2015 See the schedule of interdepartmental bus in Uruguay. Excludes schedules Rio Branco Terminal. It is not mandatory to have Montevideo as source or destination. When there is no direct line is necessary that the user knows the political map of Uruguay to find a combination that works for you. For example, to go from Melo to Salto there is no direct line, one option is to search from Melo to Tacuarembó and Tacuarembó after a jump. The application provides the result as published in: https://catalogodatos.gub.uy/dataset/horarios-interdepartamentales-omnibus . Hours are temporal coverage from 01/03/2015 to 18/12/2015. Date last data update: March 25, 2015

description: Presenter is an app that assists you in giving dynamic presentations by utilizing hardware that you already have: With this wireless software presentation device you can use your smartphone to switch between the slides of any PowerPoint, OpenOffice or PDF presentation. Works with any bluetooth enabled Windows, Mac, or Linux computer. Substitutes input hardware like laser pointer, clickr or power point remote. Features: - No frills: Does what you need in a presentation, no more fancy unnecessary stuff - Complete cross plattform support, works with any Windows, Mac and Linux PC - Switch slides with intuitive gestures (and volume keys) - Blank presentation screen - A timer that tells you how long your presentation lasts - Lightning fast response time - Quick and reliable connection - Bluetooth connectivity, i.e. no dependance on WLAN coverage - User centered design process ensures intuitive interaction Please note: You need a small and free server program for the app to run (this is not our fault, but caused by limited support of bluetooth profiles by Android). Setup is easy: Download app from market, download and install server software from http://small-worlds.de/presenter/ Let the two devices connect and swipe left or right to change the slides! Note: If devices do not pair automatically, follow the instructions from your computer to pair your devices (only required once!). Note: This free version only runs for some minutes. Test and enjoy. The full version can be bought from the market. We are happy to hear from you: Please send us your feedback, this will help us improve the app. Visit us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/presenterratisbonsoft
release_text: No more freezes! Fixed bug, that caused Presenter to sometimes freeze when pressing On/Off Button during a running presentation.

Starship Commander is a fast-paced top-down perspective free space shooter game. Required skills are more than fast reactions and memorising enemy attack war patterns. The player must also have strategy skills to equip proper upgrades and use the appropriate skills during specific space missions. Starship Commander - Space War is a classic game inspired by classic sci-fi movies like Star Trek and old school retro games like Space Invaders or Elite, making a fresh but old style game for your Android mobile. There are three game modes (Easy, Medium and Hard), and the goal of the game is to get as many lightyear points as you can before the end of the game. What do you waiting for? Start your spaceship engines and join to this ultimate galactic space war game. Main features: # 7 different alien invaders with 100+ unique spaceships to fight against # 90+ missions in 16 unlockable galaxies war with 3 difficulty levels # Ability to change weapons and use active skills during the space missions # 6+ fully customizable spaceships with 120+ upgrades (including turrets and special modules) # Huge alien bosses # Continuously challenging survival mode with infinite stages # Ultra hard Chaos Rise war mode for elite players This version of Starship Commander is free to try, however at some point during the campaign, you must purchase the full version in order to finish the game. Some of the listed features become available only after the full game is unlocked. *** Get bonuses and unlock additional unique features by entering promotional codes in the game. Visit our Facebook page for more information! https://www.facebook.com/TubiGames/app_190322544333196 *** Troubleshooting Tips: # The game supports 2 texture modes, use HIGH for devices with resolution 480x800 or above, and use LOW for anything below. # If you experience missing textures or white screens during the game, you might have ran out of texture memory. Try switching the texture mode setting to LOW and/or the details setting to DISABLED. # Turning sound and music OFF in the options menu may increase the game performance on slower devices. # When you complete a transaction through Google Play, the purchased item should appear immediately when you return to the application. If it doesn't, go to the unlock menu, and enter code "0000000001". This will restore all transactions you have made through Google Play. (Requires Internet access.) *** Gameplay Tips: # LY (Light Year) is the game currency for purchasing ship upgrades and for unlocking new galaxies to venture forth. Spend it wisely! # If you ran out of LY, you can finish accomplished missions again to get more. Asteroid rich missions are especially good for this purpose. # Rerunning a mission on Hard difficulty increases the LY gain. # Equipped turrets and turret modifiers can be switched any time during a mission. Equipped special modules can be used as active skills once within their cooldown interval. Equipped upgrades are passively modify your ship properties. # If you find a mission too hard, finish another mission first! You may also change difficulty setting to Easy for that specific mission. # Different enemies may require different strategies. Although a weapon with great amount of damage can be efficient against large and strong enemies, weapons with smaller damage but fast rate of fire could be better against smaller foes. ***

Firstly, thanks for taking out time to read this. :-) Ganesh Chaturthi also known as Vinayaka Chaturthi, is the Hindu festival celebrated on the occasion of birthday of Lord Ganesha, the son of Shiva and Parvati, who is believed to bestow his presence on earth for all his devotees in the duration of this festival. It is the day Shiva declared his son Ganesha as superior to all the gods. Ganesha is widely worshipped as the god of wisdom, prosperity and good fortune and traditionally invoked at the beginning of any new venture or at the start of travel. The festival, also known as Ganeshotsav ("festival of Ganesha") is observed in the Hindu calendar month of Bhadrapada, starting on the fourth day of the waxing moon period. The festival lasts for 10 days, ending on Anant Chaturdashi (fourteenth day of the waxing moon period). While celebrated all over India, it is most elaborate in Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka and Goa. Outside India, it is celebrated widely in Nepal and by Hindus in the United States, Canada, Mauritius,Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, Burma and Fiji. The application helps a devotee to perform a complete puja on the first day when the Ganapati idol is brought home. It lists all the ingredients required to perform the puja, the arrangement of the puja, audio to perform the puja and the visarjan ritual The app requires permission for checking status of voice call to avoid disturbing the puja audio.

description: *NOTE* There is a problem with some phones that require the phone to be restarted before the widgets will appear* Please see reviews here:- http://www.androidtapp.com/awesome-widgets-bundle http://www.androidvideoreview.net/2011/12/awesome-widgets-android-video-review/ http://www.pocketdroid.net/daily-android-app-awesome-widgets-pro http://apps400.com/android-apps/awesome-widgets-bundle-android-app-from-sirocco.html Awesome Widgets gives you a choice of 40+ Toggles, Settings and Weather micro-widgets which are fully customizable. At the tap of a finger you can switch between 24 hour and 5 day weather, and with the addition of a clock and up to 12 app shortcuts per Awesome Bar, you can take complete control of your Android device. Awesome Widgets allows you to have a truly unique home-screen. It provides over 400 themes/skins for both the Awesome Bar and Awesome Clock which can be instantly downloaded from within the app. These skins can be mixed and matched to suit your individual preference or alternatively you can create your own theme / skin quickly and easily. When adding your widget a preview is provided to show exactly how the widget will look with your selected skin and micro-widgets. Existing widgets can be customized at any stage allowing you to transform your home-screen thus providing ultimate personalisation. Awesome Widgets also enables you to easily access an increased number of widgets in an organised manner. It therefore becomes a single tool which replaces a lot of disconnected widgets floating around the home-screen --------------------------------------------------------------------------News--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Our skinning guide is now available at: - http://www.siroccosoftware.com/awesome/page?id=3 Any Feature Requests or Problems please let us know: - ashley@siroccoracing.com Here is a full list of the current Micro-widgets: - Weather ------------------- 5 Day - Today 5 Day - Tomorrow 5 Day + 2 days 5 Day + 3 days 5 Day + 5 days Current Weather Weather + 3 hours Weather + 6 hours Weather + 9 hours Weather + 12 hours Toggles ------------------- Auto Sync Auto Rotate Bluetooth Flight Mode GPS Torch/Flashlight Ringer/Sound Brightness (Low/Med/High/Auto) Screen Lock Wifi Indicator ------------------- Battery Indicator + Usage Shortcut (accurate to 1% if your device supports it) Settings ------------------- APN Settings Accessibility Settings Application List Application Settings Bluetooth Settings Date/Time Settings Display Settings Dock Settings Flight Mode Settings GPS Settings Language Settings Password Settings Security Settings Sound Settings Text to Speech Settings VPN Settings Voice Settings WIMAX Settings Wifi Settings Shortcuts ------------------- Force the device to lock Send Email Instantly Send SMS Instantly * A Micro-widget is a small toggle switch or settings shortcut ------------------- Skins / Themes ------------------- A Skin or Theme is a way to dramatically transform the look of the widget by changing the icon and background graphics. There are a number of built in Skins provided for the widgets, but there are also hundreds of downloadable skins available to download at the click of a button. Some skins also allow customization of the colours of the icons or background to have a skin that is totally unique to you. If you don't find a skin you like you can easily make your own skin to support your favourite team or for an occasion or whatever your like, be creative! Our skinning guide is now available at: - http://www.siroccosoftware.com/awesome/page?id=3 ------------------- App Shortcuts ------------------- As well as the provided micro-widgets you can also add shortcuts to already installed apps to the Awesome Toolbar. This means that you can have up to 12 app shortcuts per row rather than the usual 4. This will save a lot of space on your home page.

description: Another cute puzzle game from creators of Jewellust! This funny puzzler has 42 levels, 6 power-ups, 2 game modes and online score tables. Also we've added the Kid Mode for relaxed play. A free lite version is available for you to estimate gameplay. Now even cheaper - 30% off! See full game info on our site: smartpixgames.com! Welcome to Fairyland! Animals can speak here and they live in peace with people, lunarians and robots. Their kids enjoy summer at scout camps together, and you work there as the delicacy specialist. You must feed kids with delicacies, but tastes differ - children like lollipops, while kittens prefer mice, and so on. Mind their preferences and hand out the delicacies as fast as you can! ***Game Rules*** Tap food then tap a kid and you're done... But look, here is another one! Each kid should get the delicacy before he goes away, or you will lose. There are colored balls around the kids and once you collect a sufficient number of balls (varies from level to level) your shift is over. Collect balls as quick as possible! ***Rewards*** The less time you spend to gather the balls, the more valuable reward you receive. Available reward and its time can be seen near the timer. The more rewards you have, the higher you are in worldwide hall of fame among the other delicacy specialists. ***Camps*** Camps differ by number of various kids and balls; at some camps special features (power-ups) are available. At each camp you spend five shifts. When you pass them, the next camp becomes available. To get a more valuable reward you may replay any available camp. ***Single game mode*** Rules are the same, but your aim is to get as much balls as possible. Gradually new kids and bonuses become available and game speed increases. ***Bonuses and specials*** So many children, so much food! Power-ups will help you when it seems that it's impossible to win.

description: Turn your screen into an enchanting forest with beautiful fireflies swarm wandering in the woods and cherish the warmth of different natural elements such as snow and rain. Set your world all according to your wish with different customizable elements. Firefly Forest is surely a must for all nature lovers coz no one will be able to resist the beauty and charm of this awesome live wallpaper once it gets onto your screen. Firefly Forest has very high quality graphics, all the details are worked out at the highest level. High resolution used elements allows for the use of wallpaper without loss of quality even on tablets. Features Available- - 5 rich background themes to choose from + Choose any image from gallery,crop it and set it as the background theme - Set different sound,touch and scroll options - Customize the density, speed, size and color of fireflies - Choose from 3 different seasons- Sunny, Winter and Rainy - Watch Clouds and Thunderstorm effects along with Rain - Customize the density and speed of clouds - Choose from 3 different styles of rain/snow- Normal, Raindrops/Snowflakes, Glowing - Customize the speed, density and angle of different seasonal elements(rain/snow) - Choose different fps according to your phone memory - No push notifications, No Spyware, No Malware , Completely AD FREE - App can be moved to SD Card All said,this live wallpaper is a complete package offered to you because we understand that every individual has different choices and we can't just force our choices on you. This is the reason we have manifested this live wallpaper into a completely customizable package which every user can alter according to his choice. So forget searching for individual snowfall, rainfall or jungle live wallpapers because you can turn Firefly Forest easily into any of the these and that's not all, if you want to watch your house wetting in rain or you dancing in snow, then simply choose your image as background theme and let the natural elements take your breath away. Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -> Firefly Forest Pro
release_text: In version 1.2- - Added activity screen to ease choosing the live wallpaper - Minor bug fixes

description: 25 tunnels are included for you to explore. This is a Live wallpaper with a trance inducing effect, which can be used as a hypnosis tool. You will start a with a mix of all of the tunnels. After that, move on and watch "Tunnel to Atlantis", "Fractal flower", "Shaman's tunnel" and all of the other tunnels! The app has been designed with hypnotic and mind elevating tunnels, ideal for meditation. It is possible to meditate and free the mind from all thoughts by concentrating on any of the tunnels. All these are included: Shining lotus tunnel Shaman's tunnel Interdimensional tunnel Astral tunnel Anahata lotus tunnel Gold mine tunnel Purple lotus tunnel Brick tunnel Blob tunnel Brick tunnel 2 Stone wall tunnel Alien cells tunnel Colored brick wall tunnel Mystical tunnel Underground plasma tunnel Eye tunnel Fractal flower tunnel Exo cell tunnel Smooth tunnel Lava tunnel Tunnel to Atlantis Alien microbes Maya tunnel DJ Chamans tunnel Spectrum tunnel You can enjoy this free version for as long as you want, but the full version has much more features. It is a music visualizer, which syncs the tunnels with your favorite music. You can mix the tunnels, just like a VJ (VideoJockey). Make your own mix of the tunnels in any order that you want and choose how they are mixed. You can also choose the colors, the speed, the fog density and the appearance of the textures. The full version has no commercials and battery saving functionality is included.

description: FOR INSTRUCTIONS HIT "MENU" AND "VOLUME UP" AT THE SAME TIME This magical app for Android enables you to impress your friends with your amazing mindreading skills. Little do they know that it's all in the wrist. To do this trick you just need your device and four ordinary playing cards (jack, queen, king, and ace). First you show your friends that you have an ordinary drawing app on your phone (you can actually draw on the screen). Then, through mentalistic art, you write down the card that you know they are going to pick and lay the phone down. After they named your prediction, you lift your phone to show them the name of the card they picked. Magic! Easy to do, but your friends won't be able to figure it out. Become a mystical mindreader with this fun app for your Android device. No Voice recognition, no Camera, instant reset. Phone is examinable. FOR INSTRUCTIONS HIT "MENU" AND "VOLUME UP" AT THE SAME TIME illusion magic ellusion penguin magic trick theory11 ellusionist

description: 기상청 모바일 앱 공모전 우수상 수상작인 원기날씨는 기상청에서 제공하는 데이터를 바탕으로 동/읍/면 단위의 날씨정보를 제공합니다. 원기날씨를 통해 최대 다섯 군데까지의 즐겨 찾는 지역을 저장하여 현재날씨, 3시간별예보, 주간예보 그리고 미세먼지 오염도를 확인할 수 있습니다. 또 전국날씨와 위성, 레이더영상 그리고 기상특보를 이용해 국내 기상 변화를 간편하게 관측할 수 있습니다. 그밖에 눈/비, 미세먼지, 기상특보 자동 알람과 상태바 현재날씨, 다양한 종류의 위젯 등의 편의 기능을 제공합니다. ● 미세먼지 기상청의 먼지관측농도(PM10) 또는 환경부 한국환경공단의 데이터를 기반으로 각 지역의 미세먼지 오염도를 제공합니다. 앱 실행 후 시간별예보 화면 중단의 구름 모양 버튼을 선택하면 됩니다. 또 미세먼지 예보를 통해 내일의 대기질도 확인할 수 있습니다. ● 눈/비, 미세먼지, 기상특보 알람 앱을 실행하지 않아도 예기치 못한 눈이나 비 소식이 있을 때 또는 대기 질이 나쁘거나 새로운 기상특보가 발효되었을 때 자동으로 알려줍니다. 간단한 설정 몇 가지면 원하는 시각에 통지받을 수 있습니다. ● 상태바 현재날씨 현재날씨가 궁금할 때 더 이상 앱을 실행하지 않아도 됩니다. 이 기능을 이용하면 드래그 한 번으로 현재의 기상 상태를 파악할 수 있습니다. ● 위성영상 한반도/아시아/지구 범위의 위성과 레이더영상, 기상특보를 통해 우리나라의 기상 변화를 한눈에 관측할 수 있습니다. ● 위젯 원기날씨는 11가지 크기의 다양한 위젯을 제공합니다. 현재날씨, 미세먼지, 시간별예보, 주간예보, 현재시각을 조합하여 기호에 맞는 위젯을 선택할 수 있습니다. 더불어 총 14가지 종류의 위젯 스킨과 투명도, 터치했을 때의 동작을 함께 지정할 수 있습니다. ● 테마 현재날씨의 변화에 맞춰 다양한 배경화면이 내 손을 따라 움직입니다. 또, 취향 따라 골라 쓸 수 있는 여러 날씨 아이콘이 준비되어 있으며 ‘커스텀 아이콘’ 기능을 통해 나만의 아이콘을 사용할 수 있습니다. 사용 중 오류 및 건의사항은 메일이나 블로그를 통해 언제든 문의주세요! description: It’s summer vacation! Are you going on holiday with your family? You can go by car, train, bus or by airplane! In this game you are the stewardess who need to clean the airplane before the next flight. First you can do the indoor of the private jet. It’s a real mess in this plane can you help the stewardess to clean it up? There are 3 levels in this clean game for girls. ✔the indoor of the jet ✔ the cockpit ✔ the outdoor of the plane The visitors and the pilots made a big mess of the airplane when they were flying to their vacation destiny and now you can clean up the rubbish. You begin with cleaning up the indoor of the airplane. Do the mess in the dustbin and place the good things back where they belong. You also need to vacuuming and to dust the room. When you are ready with the indoor you go further with the cockpit. Also the pilot made a mess of the cockpit of his plane and stewardess cleans it up. Help her with the vacuum cleaner, window washing and throw the rubbish away. The pilots will be very happy with a clean cockpit and shiny windows! The last thing you need to do is washing the outdoor of the plane. During the flight the plane has become dirty. Wash and polish the airplane and give it the color you like and you can also choose a nice design. Do you like games to clean up the house but want something different? This game is the right game for you! This kids cleaning game is a nice variation. Features of free airplane flight clean up: ❀ clean up game for girls, kids and toddlers ❀ easy to play ❀ with three levels ❀ summer holiday style Do your kids love cleaning games? Then they will like this game! Special for the summer holiday we designed this airplane flight clean up game. Airplane flight clean up is a game from Top Girl games and one of the best clean up game for kids and toddlers, we publish many different easy to play girl game apps. We hope you will enjoy our Airplane flight clean up and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter. So we can keep you up to date on our girl games, dressup, spa salon and cleaning up games. ♥ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp ♥ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup

My Color Guide guives you access to thousands of colors and palettes (including Sherwin-Winlliams, and RAL pallettes). Share the colors and their hex code with your clients and friends by email. This application helps you keep an inventory and wish list of colors that you can browse anytime. You can also use My Color Guide with the camera on your phone to tell you the names of colors in real-time and save them into custom palettes. Must have app for graphic designers, painters, artists, illustrators and color lovers alike! Features: • Capture a color from your phone camera and match it to one of thousand available colors. • Modify Contrast, Saturation, Brightness and Hue of Camera Stream • Create a custom palette. • Search for specific colors or browse the full RAL, Sherwin-Williams and custom color palettes. • Save colors to your custom palettes to compare palettes or share with friends and family via email. • Learn color names, RGB values, and hexadecimal numbers. • Available in 6 different languages (English, German, French, Spanish, Netherlands and Italian) Due to technical limitations, colors seen within the application may not accurately reflect real colors. We are actively adding new features to this app, so please send us feedback to emmanuel.garnier.dev@gmail.com . We read every email!

Train your brain and math skills with this game! Solve math tasks and get to the high score. The rules are simple: You will get different multiplication tasks. If the answer is wrong a point will be subtracted. You have 200 seconds for the game! Multiplication training game is an addicting math game for those that like to play games online for free. OpenConnect is an SSL VPN client for Cisco AnyConnect and ocserv gateways. FEATURES - One-click connection (batch mode) - Supports RSA SecurID and TOTP software tokens - Keepalive feature to prevent unnecessary disconnections - Compatible with ARMv7, x86, and MIPS devices - No root required - 100% open source (GPLv2+); 100% free; no ads - Based on the popular OpenConnect Linux package REQUIREMENTS - An account on a suitable VPN server - Android 4.0 (ICS) or higher (with working VpnService + tun infrastructure) XDA thread and FAQ: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2616121 Source code: https://github.com/cernekee/ics-openconnect Please do not use the reviews to request features or report issues, as they do not provide a suitable forum for support. Please post your question in the XDA thread, file a bug report in the Github project, or email me directly at cernekee+oc@gmail.com .

description: It's time for bed and you've run out of ideas for lulling your baby to sleep? Try playing 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' on your Android™ phone and you'll be surprised to see your children doze off in a few minutes! We collected best “nursery rhymes” for kids especially for you and your little ones. You will enjoy soothing songs and relaxing sounds as your child enters the land of sweet dreams. Download best lullaby music for your baby sleep today and experience the bliss of a calm and peaceful parent. Good night and enjoy your healthy dreaming! ★Songs for kids on your mobile phone! ★Perfect sound to sleep to! ★Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! ★These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! ★'How do I get a baby to sleep' is a question that will never pop in your mind again! ★These cute nursery songs are followed by beautiful backgrounds! Are you in desperate need of music for insomnia? 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is an amazing and most effective Android™ application that you can use at bedtime. Resting is crucial to your child's health and well-being. These “children songs” and lullaby music for babies will stay in your kids' memory throughout the entire life. Surprise them with these nursery lullabies - this is also a nice opportunity for your children to start learning nursery rhyme lyrics. Provide your kids with good quality baby music, wish them a goodnight and relax as long as you like! Get these songs for toddlers today and see for yourself! Your baby can't remain quiet? Crying can be their way of asking to be held close. Newborns sleep a lot – typically up to 16 to 17 hours a day. But most babies don't stay asleep for more than two to four hours at a time, day or night, during the first few weeks of life. The result? Lots of sleep for baby and a very irregular – and tiring – schedule for you. Your job is to respond to your newborn's cues, so you'll probably be up several times during the night to change, feed, and comfort him. Free lullabies can only help! 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is here, waiting for you to download it! Singing soothing lullabies and other children songs is a time-tested way to help a sleepy infant drift off. Your little one loves hearing her favorite sound — your voice — and the soft, infant music may calm her. Playing a CD or tape of music for toddlers, sleeping music, or other music for kids while you settle your newborn to sleep — and then leaving it on at low volume after you leave — can help ease the transition from being awake to falling asleep. A sound machine may soothe her, too, with the added benefit of drowning out outside noise. Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

This app allows me to get as close as I've ever been to personally cooking with you in your kitchen. So grab some extra-virgin olive oil, and let's cook some great food!!" - Mario Batali A new vision for what a cooking app can be – the most advanced and comprehensive cooking app yet. * OffNav is an android (>= 2.1) based moving map application intended for offline marine and land navigation. * Maps are created by the user and loaded on SD card (see user manual). * Neither Wifi nor mobile network connection are needed for map presentation. * Points of interest (named way-points) can be added by the user based on GPS fix, WGS84 lat/long coordinates (in marine mode), tapping on map, street addressing (in land mode) or be loaded from a text file. * Anchor (marine mode) and proximity (land and marine modes) alarms can be set for each waypoint. * Track can be saved to a file in both marine and land modes. * Turn-by-turn navigation including audio instruction is available in land mode (Wifi or network connection are needed to download route instructions). * A compass screen presents heading and bearing to way-point information, in addition to other navigational data, in both graphical and textual formats. The user manual can be downloaded from ftp site: ftp://ftp.offnav.com user: anonymous@offnav.com password: not required go to data folder

description: Solitair / Patience The purpose of patience generally involves manipulating a layout of cards with a goal of sorting them in some manner. However it is possible to play the same games competitively (often a head to head race) and cooperatively. Patience games typically involve dealing cards from a shuffled deck into a prescribed arrangement on a tabletop, from which the player attempts to reorder the deck by suit and rank through a series of moves transferring cards from one place to another under prescribed restrictions. Some games allow for the reshuffling of the deck(s), and/or the placement of cards into new or "empty" locations. In the most familiar, general form of Patience, the object of the game is to build up four blocks of cards going from ace to king in each suit, taking cards from the layout if they appear on the table.

Sudoku is number-placement puzzle. Play Sudoku daily free. Sudoku is a fun game and great for brain fitness. Other names: sodoku, sudoko, suduku, sodoko, sudoku. Be careful Sudoku is an addictive game. Sudoku means single number. Suuji, which can be translated as the digits must be single. Each Sudoku has a unique solution that can be reached logically without guessing. Enter digits from 1 to 9 into the blank spaces. Every row must contain one of each digit. So must every column, as must every 3x3 square. Does a Sudoku have more than one solution? Properly formed Sudoku always have only one solution. In our view, a Sudoku with more than one solution is not properly formed, but of course puzzles from other sources may have multiple answers. SUDOKU The grading is based on the logic steps required to solve the puzzle. The requirement to use any of a number of pre-defined logic steps makes a puzzle hard, and needing "hard" logic more than a few times makes a puzzle very hard. Of course, difficulty is subjective. One person may find a particular type of logic easy, while another finds it really difficult. There are often only a relatively small number of "choke" points in even a very hard puzzle. If you happen to spot the "hard" steps quickly, then you'll fly through! Sudoku kills time. Sudoku = brain power Sudoku on android phone. There are many SUDOKU apps but, we want to be your SUDOKU app sudoku puzzles with difficulty levels ranging from easy to evil SUDOKU has tons of options to make your game play more enjoyable.
